DOC.brief_title: Carbetocin Oxytocin Elective Caesarean Section With High Risk Postpartum Hemorrhage
DOC.detailed_description: Women randomize two group use COMPUTER-GENERATED RANDOM NUMBER LIST . 264 dark color envelops serially number contain correspond letter correspond drug use . Group C : 132 woman carbetocin group receive bolus 100 Î¼g intravenous injection delivery anterior shoulder . Group O : 132 woman oxytocin group receive 5 IU oxytocin slow intravenous injection delivery anterior shoulder . - All patient receive general anaesthesia . - Operation carry three year registrar ( least ) . - Uterus repair situ . Primary endpoint : amount blood loss . - Blood loss estimate use change Hb % hematocrit , actual blood loss calculate use follow equation : - The actual blood loss equal estimate blood volume X difference initial hematocrit final hematocrit / initial hematocrit Secondary endpoint include : 1 . The need additional uterotonic medication carbetocin oxytocin administration . - Uterine tone Uterine fundus level ( respect umbilical point , UP ) monitor CS , end CS , 2 hour , 12 hour 24 hour delivery - Additional uterotonic drug , need sufficient uterine tone achieve within 5 minute oxytocin carbetocin administration , include : i. Ergometrine 0.5 mg slow intravenous injection . ii . Misopristol 1000 microgram rectally . 2 . The need blood transfusion operative intervention relate PPH - The need blood transfusion operative intervention ( B-Lynch suture , uterine artery ligation , internal iliac artery ligation , Hysterectomy ) consider . 3 . The change hemoglobin hematocrit post versus pre CS - The drop hemoglobin level hematocrit evaluate compare hemoglobin concentration admission 24 hour delivery . 4 .
